SUMMARY:
X application
A program to create an index of scalable font files for X
DEPENDS:
util-macros-native virtual/libx11
util-macros-native zlib libfontenc freetype xorgproto
DESCRIPTION: For each directory argument, mkfontscale reads all of the scalable font files in the directory. For every font file found, an X11 font name (XLFD) is generated, and is written together with the file name to a file fonts.scale in the directory.  The resulting fonts.scale is used by the mkfontdir program.
